items.content_html: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.
items.title: ennypitan/TinyPath: TinyPath is a lightweight and efficient URL shortener that transforms long web addresses into compact, easy-to-share links. With a clean and intuitive interface, TinyPath allows users to generate shortened URLs quickly, track link performance, and manage their links effortlessly.

items.content_html: "Gemini Clone replicates Gemini's secure, minimalistic web protocol for fast, privacy-focused browsing. This lightweight alternative to the modern web supports text-based content with simplicity, security, and user control at its core. Ideal for low-bandwidth or privacy-conscious environments.
items.title: shrey2609/Gemini-Clone: "Gemini Clone replicates Gemini's secure, minimalistic web protocol for fast, privacy-focused browsing. This lightweight alternative to the modern web supports text-based content with simplicity, security, and user control at its core. Ideal for low-bandwidth or privacy-conscious environments.
